name: Lost in the Crowd
source: Osirion, Land of the Pharaohs pg. 29
text: You are used to dealing with the teeming masses in the markets, and are capable of disappearing into them at a momentâ€™s notice.
benefit: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Hide checks in urban areas; this bonus increases to +4 in crowds. You gain a +1 dodge bonus to AC when threatened by 2 or more enemies.
